name: Compare Protein Structures
description: Compare two protein structures to identify structural differences and conformational changes using RMSD and per-residue distance analysis
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install biopython numpy

inputs.name: PDB_FILE1
inputs.description: Path to the first PDB file

inputs.name: PDB_FILE2
inputs.description: Path to the second PDB file

inputs.name: CHAIN_ID1
inputs.description: Chain ID to analyze in the first structure

inputs.name: CHAIN_ID2
inputs.description: Chain ID to analyze in the second structure
